snippet: South by Southwest this year has big names including Bruce Springsteen, but for many visitors to the festival, the 400 or so homegrown acts from around the state are the major draw.
lead_paragraph: South by Southwest this year has big names including Bruce Springsteen, but for many visitors to the festival, the 400 or so homegrown acts from around the state are the major draw.

headline.seo: Some 400 Texas Bands, Like Bright Light Social Hour, Are at SXSW 2012
headline.main: Locals Try to Make Themselves Heard at SXSW
headline.print_headline: Locals Try to Make Themselves Heard at SXSW
